response.overview: A Jewish girl cannot attend a school group project meetup because of Rosh Hashanah. Her group mates, who do not understand Judaism and its practices, misunderstand her, believing she's just trying to make excuses to escape schoolwork. A mutual friend of both parties explains the importance of respecting each other's beliefs.
response.tagline: Ask a question, listen to a story, be a bridge.
response.title: Be A Bridge
